definition: (of dry soil, skin etc) to crack/to chap
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: The ground parched and cracked is like overbaked bread.
sentences.chinese: 地面干裂如烤焦的面包。

sentences.english: Rosehip Seed Lip Balm Pure plant lip balm for chapped and dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 为干裂的唇部调制的植物性护唇膏。

sentences.english: R66 Repeated exposure may cause skin dryness or cracking.
sentences.chinese: 长期接触可能引起皮肤干裂。

sentences.english: A fly alighted on her cracked lips, and I brushed it away.
sentences.chinese: 一只苍蝇落在她干裂的嘴唇上，我轰走了它。

sentences.english: Do you have anything for chapped skin?
sentences.chinese: 有没有擦皮肤干裂的药？

sentences.english: One of the most obvious effects is chapped skin and flaky skin.
sentences.chinese: 最明显的就是使我们的皮肤干裂剥落。

sentences.english: Ginger Lip Balm Pure plant lip balm for chapped and dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 为干裂的唇部调制的植物性护唇膏。

sentences.english: But he had a bad voice just like a dried-up bamboo tube.
sentences.chinese: 可是，他的嗓子太差，象干裂竹筒。

sentences.english: Sleep remains difficult, with continual pain from his tough, dry skin.
sentences.chinese: 睡觉还是很困难，因为粗糙干裂的皮肤老是疼。

sentences.english: Keep them free from dry skin and cracked heels.
sentences.chinese: 使它们不受皮肤干燥和脚跟干裂的影响。

sentences.english: Eliminates areolar tissue on cuticular layer and roughness of horny layer.
sentences.chinese: 消除表皮层的蜂窝状组织和粗糙干裂的角质层。

sentences.english: Water can help prevent the lacquerware from drying and cracking.
sentences.chinese: 水可以使漆木器不至于干裂。

sentences.english: Think of the creams you put on chapped skin.
sentences.chinese: 想一想你在干裂的皮肤上涂抹药膏的情形。

sentences.english: As soil drying continued, the soil began to crack and CH4 emissions decreased to nil.
sentences.chinese: 烤田至土壤干裂时，CH4排放通量降至零。

sentences.english: In the countryside, people believe that their lips will crack if they don't eat persimmons during this period.
sentences.chinese: 在农村，人们认为霜降不吃柿子，嘴唇会干裂。

sentences.english: The land in this region is dry and parched.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的土地是干裂的。

definition: to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
